name: Hatsune Miku Logic Paint
description:
Official Hatsune Miku puzzle game has arrived!
Includes stages with variable difficulties from LV1 to LV3 as well as Special Stages!
Receive illustrations of the characters for completing puzzles!

Clear the stages and collect them all!
*No in-app purchases.

"What is MIKULOGI?"
Use the numbers to the top and left to fill in the squares and complete the image!
Place an "x" in spaces left blank to prevent mistakes!

"Features"
-Difficulty options allow for everyone from beginners to experts to enjoy!

-A total of 225 stages with over 150 illustrations!

-Control options allow for one-handed play!

-All stages can be paused during play.

-Includes a hint system to help with difficult puzzles!

-Receive stars for clearing without misses or hints! Collect stars and show off!
